abstract: The Year of the Dragon, which began on Monday, has been good in the past for the shares of Berkshire Hathaway, Mr. Buffett’s investment vehicle.
snippet: The Year of the Dragon, which began on Monday, has been good in the past for the shares of Berkshire Hathaway, Mr. Buffett’s investment vehicle.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett is many things, but a songster?

headline.main: Buffett Rings in Chinese New Year With a Serenade
